They had three sons - Dadi (Adrian Pang), Dashan (San Yow) and Daqiu (Cavin Soh). Zhou Dong disappeared after a kidnap attempt went awry; not even his body was found.

programme.desc: In addition to the houses, apartments and lofts of various styles and prices which Cedric Wautier shows us through his many visits, this programme about homes offers legal, practical, technical, energy and aesthetic advice, without forgetting the part about the all-important DIY ''tricks''.

programme.title: Chateau ! - EP 7
programme.desc: The Chateau de Monte-Cristo is a delightful architectural folly, designed by the writer Alexandre Dumas. Whereas the Chateau de Chambord was a truly grandiose masterpiece commissioned by a French king, Francis I.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: Courants D'est - EP 19
programme.desc: In Lorraine, Jean-Marie Pelt's botanical garden is a rolling park covering 35 hectares. It is home to over 12,000 plant varieties: tropical, carnivore, threatened with extinction and much more. Carine Aigon sets off to meet those who care for it on a daily basis.

programme.title: Les Femmes Preferent En Rire
programme.desc: Does laughter help spread feminism? That's what a new generation of women comedians believe. Scathing and impertinent, their razor-sharp view of the world spares nothing and no-one as they deploy their weapons of massive derision and bring a breath of fresh air to the world of the one-woman-show.

programme.title: Le 6h00 Info
programme.desc: The 6am news bulletin (Paris time) by the France Televisions editorial team.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week With Flavie Flament and Julien Arnaud on weekdays, Maya Lauque and Damien Thevenot at weekends.

programme.title: Ligue 1 Mcdonald's - Avant-Matchs

programme.title: Slam
programme.desc: Three contestants compete in a game of arrow crosswords, trying to complete the grids by finding the answers to the definitions provided. But to have access to those definitions, they first need to answer questions that all share one common characteristic: the response is always a letter.

programme.title: Le Journal De Radio-Canada

programme.title: Les Quiquoi - EP 36
programme.desc: Olive, Petole, Boulard, Mixo, Raoul and Pamela make up a full-of-fun gang known as the Quiquoi. Together they ask a host of existential questions, using drawings to find the answers. In their own quirky way, they love nothing better than creating surrealist worlds where everything becomes possible.

programme.title: Gigantosaurus - EP 20
programme.desc: Four little dinosaurs, Rocky, Bill, Tiny and Mazu, discover a dangerous world where the mysterious Gigantosaurus, the most ferocious of all the dinosaurs, is forever on the prowl. The four best friends set their heading for adventure, confronting their fears and working together to solve all their problems.

programme.title: Toc Toc ! - EP 35
programme.desc: Whenever an animal is stressed or bothered about something, they head straight to see Claude the bull. Well-known as a doctor for minor ills, he is particularly skilled in soothing everyday troubles and resolving misunderstandings. With Claude's help, the animals learn to love themselves as they are: imperfect.

programme.title: Les Mutants - EP 34
programme.desc: Guy gives Tom a necklace belonging to his mother, claiming this is proof she's still alive. For her part, Lila tries to persuade Julianne to get back in touch with Bertrand.

programme.title: Vendee Globe 2024
programme.desc: Daily summary of the 10th Vendee Globe, non-stop solo sailing race around the world with no assistance. The skippers cover around 45,000 km crossing the world, passing the Cape of Good Hope, Cape Leeuwin and Cape Horn. Arrival and departure: Les Sables d'Olonne.

programme.title: Les Quatre Coins De L'assiette - EP 7
programme.desc: Chef Pierre Richard de Moncton shares his recipe for mackerel with seasonal vegetables and caviar from local sturgeon.

programme.title: Les Petits Meurtres D'agatha Christie
programme.desc: The head of a luxury empire, Pierre Baldini, is savagely assassinated. He was just about to disinherit his only daughter; she finds herself targeted by the police. Greco needs to keep a cool head in this case which takes her back in time.

programme.title: Version Francaise - EP 5
programme.desc: The apartments of Louis XV's intendants in the Hotel de la Marine. Between art and interior decoration, designer Ingrid Donat blends style and material to perfection. Alexander McQueen: a personality expressed through mystical romanticism. Between poetry and transparency: Atelier Stokowski, or the adventure of three brothers, master glassworkers.

programme.title: Femmes De L'art - EP 7
programme.desc: In the 18th century few women were able to join the Royal Academy of Painting and Sculpture, and work for Europe's most important royalty. With her character of tempered steel and her talent, she became her Marie-Antoinette's official portrait painter.

programme.title: #Investigation
programme.desc: Your rendezvous for current affairs and investigative journalism from the RTBF teams. Research, evidence, personal stories and confrontations are at the heart of the film reports about a range of subjects mainly relating to Belgian society. The key words? Independence and transparency!

programme.title: Geopolitis
programme.desc: Analysis, explanations, neutrality... ''Geopolitis'' offers an unbiased in-depth look at international current affairs, with accuracy, precision and a constant desire to make an increasingly complex and conflictual world easier to understand.

programme.title: Echappees Belles - EP 34
programme.desc: For this special programme, Jerome heads to Angers to join Stephane Marie and Carole Tolila, from the programme ''Silence, ca pousse''. Exploring the city, its innumerable possibilities for outdoor leisure and the delights of its gastronomy... we discover a weekend menu that's both copious and rich in fascinating encounters.

programme.desc: French creativity is booming in the fields of fashion, crafts, design, beauty and gastronomy. 'Tendance XXI' showcases a know-how that evolves in tune with the times, sometimes even anticipating them.

programme.desc: The speed with which the first Covid-19 vaccine was created is a veritable prowess, made possible by messenger RNA technology. We delve into this little known therapy, result of decades of research, explained by the scientists who worked tirelessly for its development.

programme.title: Il Etait Une Fois... Ces Droles D'objets - EP 51
programme.desc: Watches, speakers, toilets... Maestro takes a fascinating look at some of our most everyday objects, both old and new. How exactly to they work? What is their history?

programme.title: L'agence Galactique - EP 27
programme.desc: Specialist in every type of breakdown, Agence Galactique travels the galaxy to assist its customers. Aboard their spaceship Toaster, Dany Oven, Apple and Zed work wherever they're needed sorting out inhabitants' problems in their own inimitable way: happy, cheerful and totally eccentric.

programme.title: L'imagier Anime De Koumi - EP 26
programme.desc: At 6 years old the cheerful mischievous Koumi dreams of knowing all the animals in the world. Thanks to her picture book, she's able to head off and meet them.

programme.title: Taffy - EP 57
programme.desc: Wealthy Mrs. Muchmore lives in a manor with her beloved dog Bentley. One day, Scraggs the raccoon turns up disguised as a cat. Immediately adopted by the old lady, he becomes Taffy and laps up her attention. But Bentley is not fooled and decides to chase him off his territory.

programme.title: Kididoc - EP 45
programme.desc: Kidi, a kind-hearted artificial intelligence, guides Pomme and Fix on their journey through Kidi-World. From dinosaurs to the Chateau de Versailles, the human body to the history of aviation: Kidi-World is not only an adventure-filled wonderland but also, and above all, a means of finding the answer to every question.

programme.title: Kididoc - EP 46
programme.desc: Kidi, a kind-hearted artificial intelligence, guides Pomme and Fix on their journey through Kidi-World. From dinosaurs to the Chateau de Versailles, the human body to the history of aviation: Kidi-World is not only an adventure-filled wonderland but also, and above all, a means of finding the answer to every question.

programme.title: Nubu Et Yara - EP 28
programme.desc: Young Nubu is a little boy who's curious about everything but makes one blunder after another as he learns about life. Fortunately his wiser more responsible older sister, Yara, always has the time to explain things, offering the perfect opportunity for Nubu to dive into his own comic book world.

programme.title: 1001 Mondes Antiques - EP 2
programme.desc: Braillard, Colombe and Lablatte have discovered a way to travel through time and ancient civilisations. They journey back in time to the Middle Ages, in search of answers. How did people live in those days? How did they heal themselves? How did they see that justice was done?

programme.title: L'afrik En Contes - EP 5
programme.desc: A woman has four children. The youngest was born just as her husband died; convinced the baby is a bringer of bad luck she refuses to feed him. One day, the hyena Bouki becomes interested in this unwanted child.

programme.title: Quasimodo - EP 22
programme.desc: Paris, 1483. 16-year-old Quasimodo is a hunchbacked orphan. One day, the gypsy Esmeralda, with whom he is in love, finds herself in trouble. He sacrifices himself to save her and ends up in prison. And so begins a long series of adventures...

programme.title: Pfffirates - EP 14
programme.desc: On the island of Calypso, Captain Lamar is busy training his crews in the art of pfffiracy. Between lessons in navigation, treasure hunts and boarding other ships, it's a busy programme for everyone. But it'll take more than that to deflate Pat, Lily and Stede: the threesome feel invincible!

programme.title: 7 Jours - EP 14
programme.desc: ''7 jours'', a weekly magazine programme covering news on society and international events to know all there is to know... in French

programme.title: Falò
programme.desc: A news magazine show, ''Falò'' discusses and analyses current affairs in depth.

programme.title: Objectif Monde L'hebdo
programme.desc: Report, inquiry, investigation ... ''Objectif Monde L'Hebdo'', a television magazine by French-speaking editorialists, takes time to reflect and analyse through the expert insights and opinions provided by specialists. A TV5MONDE programme, jointly produced with RTS, in collaboration with its francophone partners (RTBF, Radio-Canada, France Televisions).

programme.title: Territoires De France
programme.desc: Discovering the treasures of the French regions, the initiatives and people who bring them to life.

programme.title: Le Magazine De La Riviera
programme.desc: The magazine programme all about the art of living in Monaco, Provence and on the Cote d'Azur.

programme.title: #Helvetica
programme.desc: What values are dear to the heart of Switzerland's most influential figures? How do they see the country, its know-how and its successes? We meet some of those taking Switzerland to the top in the fields of economics, politics, science, culture...

programme.title: Rassemblance - EP 15
programme.desc: After arriving in Marseille, Ben Amir Saadi revealed himself through his sporting achievements. After studying computer engineering, the Comorian became an entrepreneur. Father of four, storyteller and co-founder of fair trade brand Maana Sport, Ben Amir is today an activist helping Marseille's more difficult neighbourhoods, and sharing his community's culture.

programme.title: Le Match Dans Le Match
programme.desc: A key figure from the world of sport looks back at a particular competition, a career, an outstanding moment.

programme.title: Le Journal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: 400 Millions De Critiques - EP 15
programme.desc: The first major cultural magazine for the French-speaking world, an original TV5MONDE concept, ''400 millions de critiques'' (400 million critics) reviews French-speaking cultural news through the viewpoints of Belgian, Swiss, Canadian, Quebecker, and French journalists.

programme.title: Sur Le Front - EP 28
programme.desc: In a country proud of its 365 cheeses, an investigation into the hidden side of intensive dairy production. Originally almost every variety was linked to a specific breed of cow. Today the traditional breeds are increasingly replaced by those which are the most productive, making a less authentic cheese.

programme.title: Vendee Globe 2024
programme.desc: Daily summary of the 10th Vendee Globe, non-stop solo sailing race around the world with no assistance. The skippers cover around 45,000 km crossing the world, passing the Cape of Good Hope, Cape Leeuwin and Cape Horn. Arrival and departure: Les Sables d'Olonne.

programme.title: Version Francaise - EP 6
programme.desc: The Hotel de la Marine, Paris, covers two hundred and fifty years of naval history. Multi-talented artist, Aurelie Galois paints industrial canvases in rubber, just like little secret boxes. Designer Peter Do: for the love of material and the perfect cut. Agnes Kappler makes tarot cards the old-fashioned way.

programme.title: Questions Pour Un Champion
programme.desc: A general knowledge quiz.

programme.desc: A major interview focusing on world news, proposed by TV5MONDE.

programme.title: Les Freres Taloche - Mise A Jour
programme.desc: A brand new show, written by Vincent Taloche and Bruno Taloche. On the programme: uncommon airline pilots, a beginner dentist, an (all too) amateur comedian, a photo exhibition on the Middle Ages, a lesson about renewable energy, and not forgetting the Taloche Mime Games plus plenty of surprises!

programme.title: Femmes De L'art - EP 6
programme.desc: It was said of her that: ''Eve had finally become Adam's equal''. A society artist, liberated and uninhibited in the Paris of the interwar years, Lempicka mainly painted female nudes and portraits, mixing a modern aesthetic and mannerism, in the style of the Roaring Twenties.

programme.title: Tandem - Retour Vers Le Passe
programme.desc: Lea and Paul, head-over-heels in love, head off on holiday in Annie and Pierre's new house. Far from Montpellier and the police station, they intend making the most of this family time. Until the discovery of a human arm forces them to investigate. Where is the rest of the body?

programme.title: Movie - Panakkaran
programme.desc: The illegitimate son of a rich man and a singer is raised by a poor drunkard. Before he can commit to the girl he loves, he wants to find out about his biological parents.

programme.title: Movie - Raam
programme.desc: A man is falsely charged for killing his mother. His neighbours are also called in for interrogation. Everyone's effort leads to tracking down the real killer.

programme.title: Movie - Virudhunagar Sandhippu
programme.desc: A fun-loving student is raised by his college principal and falls in love with a girl, but the girl's father wants to take revenge on the principal who was responsible for putting him behind bars.

programme.title: Movie - Whistle
programme.desc: Sarawathi, a young girl, commits suicide after being bullied by Anjali and her friends. Years later, when her friends start turning up dead, she fears that Sarawathi has returned with a vengeance.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Find out all about the top goods and services as shown on television, with consumers being able to place orders for these products.

programme.title: Movie - Mannava
programme.desc: Nandini's father agrees to her marriage with Ishwar. When an astrologer predicts that Ishwar is going to kill someone in 45 days, her father postpones the marriage.

programme.title: Movie - Ram Lakshman
programme.desc: Lakshman, an elephant, and Ram are inseparable friends. Ram even refuses to marry Meena when her father insists on getting rid of Lakshman. When Ram is accused of murder, Lakshman comes to his rescue.

programme.title: Movie - Pongalo Pongal
programme.desc: Subbu and his four friends are jobless and loathed by their fathers. After losing money in a scam, they start a business with their collegemate Chitra's help. But her rich father has different plans.

programme.desc: The Vendée Globe is a single-handed, non-stop, non-assisted round-the-world sailing race that takes place every 4 years. The race has acquired an international reputation, attracting skippers from all over the world.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 32
programme.desc: In a nail-biting climax to the 2011-2012 Premier League season, Manchester City clinched the title with unparalleled drama. Facing Queens Park Rangers on the final matchday, City secured a 3-2 victory with Sergio Aguero's iconic last-minute goal, securing their first league title in 44 years and etching that game into footballing folklore. They have since become the dominant power in English football and we look at how it all began.

programme.title: FS MMA
programme.desc: BodogFIGHT features classic MMA matches involving some of your favorite fighters! This episode highlights The Best of Women's MMA from St. Petersburg, Russia.

programme.title: WCCB Jean Pascal vs. Michael Eifert
programme.desc: In this episode Jean Pascal (36-6-1, 20 KOs) and Michael Eifert (11-1, 4 KOs) battle it out in the main event from Place Bell in Laval, Canada. The contest pits Haitian-Canadian former world champion and a contender from Germany. The pair squares off in this 12 round IBF light heavyweight title eliminator.

programme.title: American Ninja Warrior
programme.desc: The next season opens with a qualifying round in Venice Beach, California. More than half of the obstacles used on this season were never seen before, and this premiere features exciting new challenges such as the Frame Slider, Domino Hill, Chain Swing and Flying Nun Chucks. Returning fan favorites in Venice Beach include parkour enthusiasts Kyle Cochran and Brent Steffensen.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Floyd Mayweather, Jr. vs. Oscar De La Hoya
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is a heavily-anticipated contest featuring two of boxing's greats - Floyd Mayweather, Jr. and Oscar De La Hoya. This fight set the record for most pay-per-view buys, as 2.4 million purchases led to over $135 million in revenue. The winner of this closely-contested bout would be WBC light middleweight champion.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 2 featuring Chiyonokuni, Tamawashi, Takayasu and Chiyotairyu from the Aki basho, 2018.

programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS WCK Nordin Ben Moh vs Albert Kraus
programme.desc: WCK features intense, nonstop battles in both freestyle kickboxing and Muay Thai from around the world. It's kickboxing's most talented athletes at their finest! This episode, from Eindhoven, the Netherlands, features main event Nordin Ben Moh (Morocco) vs. Albert Kraus (the Netherlands).

programme.title: FS MMA

programme.title: WCCB Artur Beterbiev vs. Tavoris Cloud
programme.desc: Coming off a tremendous amateur career where he captured Gold Medals in the World Championships and European Championships, Olympian Artur Beterbiev takes a big step up in competition in just his 6th pro fight, taking on former IBF Light Heavyweight World Champion Tavoris Cloud. Beterbiev had stormed through his first five opponents, scoring four knockouts, two of which took place in the first round.

programme.title: Fight Quest
programme.desc: Episode 10: California, USA - Hosts Jimmy Smith and Doug Anderson learn the Fight Discipline of Kajukenbo and the Martial Art of Hands, Feet and Throws with Masters Charles Gaylord and Greg Harper.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Paul Williams vs. Antonio Margarito
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is a WBO welterweight title bout featuring then-undefeated Paul Williams and Antonio Margarito. It's a closely scored bout, but one fighter's push towards a strong finish may have put him ahead just enough.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. programme.title: WCCB Gervonta Davis vs. Hector Luis Garcia
programme.desc: Five time World Champion and boxing superstar Gervonta 'Tank' Davis and undefeated World Champion Hector Luis Garcia kick off the year by headlining a stacked card from the Capital One Arena in Washington DC. Davis has established himself as one boxing's must-see attractions, and will be defending his WBA Lightweight World Championship against Garcia in the Main Event.

programme.title: World Karate Federation
programme.desc: The highest level of competition in the sport of karate anywhere in the world will take place from Budapest, Hungary, as the WKF SENIOR WORLD CHAMPIONSHIPS take place. The top competitors from across the globe, from six different continents, will all converge on Budapest to stake their claim as the best in the world. Don't miss the WKF SENIOR WORLD CHAMPIONSHIPS, only on FIGHT SPORTS.

programme.title: Wide World of Fights Shane Mosley vs. Saul (Canelo) Alvarez

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Bernard Hopkins vs. Winky Wright
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is a light heavyweight title contest featuring 47-4-1 Bernard Hopkins and the 51-3-1 Winky Wright, who has not lost a bout in over seven years.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. programme.title: Macho: The Hector Camacho Story
programme.desc: This series takes a hard-hitting look at the rise, fall and untimely death of one of boxing's most colorful champions. Hector Camacho's dynamic speed, footwork and power made him a fighter to be reckoned with, but it was his flamboyance and showmanship that ushered in a new era in boxing. The series chronicles his epic battles inside the ring, his struggles with addiction outside of it and the mystery of the double homicide that claimed his life.

programme.title: Tuesday Night Fights Hector Camacho vs. Rusty Derouen
programme.desc: FIGHT SPORTS revisits some of Hector Camacho's best fights from the legendary USA's Tuesday Night Fights series alongside our new documentary series Macho: The Hector Camacho Story. In this episode Hector 'Macho' Camacho (46-3-0, 20 KO) battles Rusty Derouen (33-6-0, 25 KO) in a 10-round Halbmittel contest from Erie, Pennsylvania, USA.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 17

programme.desc: The Squirrels are having a picnic and notice that the chickens eat differently than they do. Duggee has his eating badge and can explain all the different ways animals eat.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 20
programme.desc: As Peggee and the Hummingbirds journey up the river to deliver a parcel, they have fun spotting and avoiding the wildlife that they meet along the way.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 21

programme.desc: When Rubble's favorite baseball star Aaron Judge can't get out of town to the home run derby, Rubble & Crew build a stadium to hold the derby right in Builder Cove! // Surf's up for Rubble & Crew! Well, if they can get over the super hot sand, it is.

programme.title: Hamsters of Hamsterdale S1 - EP 101
programme.desc: The hamsters go on an adventure to the Place of All Foods to restock their favorite treat. // The hamsters think the digital assistant on Harry's Dad's phone is telling them what to do.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S5 - EP 502
programme.desc: The Championship Race is about to start, and all the fastest trucks in town are ready to roll! But when Crusher steals the trophy before the race even begins, it's up to Blaze and his friends to get it back in time.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. S2 - EP 50
programme.desc: The crew competes for Burn's affection after she wins a vacation; Turbo and Deuce try to beat Hardcase and make the junior racing league fun again.

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender S2 - EP 50
programme.desc: When all the controls fail on the Castle Ship due to a virus, Pidge must step up to solve the problem before it's too late

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show S1 - EP 24
programme.desc: When Peabody gets carried away trying to create the perfect band using historical friends, Sherman must stop him from becoming a music monster

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots S2 - EP 73

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots S2 - EP 74
programme.desc: Diggly is bored of the same old scraps every day. Fifi and Bumble decide to make him a pumpkin pie as a surprise. But there's no flour left to make the pastry, what will they use instead?

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective S1 - EP 47
programme.desc: When Fuse's collection of Special Things goes missing, Noddy vows to track them down. He soon works out that Bling was in Fuse's Workshop but it turns out that she just went in to add a Special Thing to Fuse's collection. More clues lead Noddy to Smartysaurus. She admits she went into Fuse's Workshop but tripped on an oil can and fled when she saw all the mess she'd made. As for the Special Things, they'd already gone when she got there.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective S1 - EP 48
programme.desc: The Captain is upset because all of his shiny gold coins have been painted grey. It's a disaster as far as the pirates are concerned! Noddy decides to investigate. He realises that the grey coins are actually the gold coin covered with paint. They're not the only things that have turned grey too - Deltoid's shiny gold medal has been painted grey too.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales S1 - EP 47
programme.desc: You see there was a time when Skunk didn't smell. Skunk smelt as sweet as sweet can be. Infact, whenever any animal had a smelly problem they went straight to Skunk. And then one day naughty Baboon tricks Skunk into tasting the yucky Smellyfruit! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales S1 - EP 48
programme.desc: You see there was a time when Cricket didn't chirrup. Infact Cricket didn't do anything at all and it was beginning to get him down. Every animal has a use. Elephant trumpets, Lion roars...but what does Cricket do? And then one day Cricket discovers that he has rhythm. Cricket finds the beat! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car S2 - EP 47
programme.desc: Big Chris realises that he only ever has good luck when he has his lucky mascot with him. But what happens when he loses it on race day?

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car S2 - EP 48
programme.desc: Roary and Plugger really want Big Chris to take part in the fun run but Big Chris isn't so sure. Can they make sure he trains for it without even realising?

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders S1 - EP 18
programme.desc: In need of some rest and relaxation, the Riders head out on vacation. But their supposedly perfect island getaway isn't quite what they hoped for.

programme.title: Go Dog Go! S2 - EP 36

But when the lights go out and the treats go missing, it's up to Tag to solve the case. / Tag and Scooch are determined to throw a Howl-O-Ween party for their cat friends in Meowbuquerque, but they must get the dogs of Pawston to change their ways so they can make the celebration more cat-friendly.

programme.title: Tip And Oh: Home For The Holidays S1 - EP 1
programme.desc: Oh takes it upon himself to introduce Christmas joy to his fellow Boovs. Unfortunately, his well-meaning mission nearly destroys the city.

programme.title: SPIRIT OF CHRISTMAS (RIDING FREE) S3 - EP 1
programme.desc: Lucky and friends must figure out how to get home in time for Christmas when a falling boulder -- and a serious snowstorm -- derail their travel plans.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Christmas Bonus - EP 1
programme.desc: _x000D_ _x000D_When Boss Baby accidentally gets mistaken for an elf and sent to the North Pole on Christmas Eve, he mobilizes unpaid elf workers against an old nemesis: that charity-loving hippie people call Santa Claus. Meanwhile, Tim races to the North Pole to get his baby brother back home in time for Templeton Family Christmas traditions.

programme.title: Captain Underpants and the Xtreme Xploits of the Xplosive Xmas S2 - EP 1
programme.desc: George and Harold love Christmas, but they feel like it could use some upgrades. So they make a comic about a new version of the holiday: BLISSMAS. Instead of red bows, laser shows! Instead of ugly sweaters, cool capes! Instead of decorating trees, creating tree-bots! The boys take Melvin’s time toad back to convince Santa to incorporate some of their ideas to his new holiday. But they come back to the present to find that their plan didn’t work quite how they’d hoped.

programme.title: Puss in Boots: The Three Diablos S1 - EP 1
programme.desc: After Puss in Boots is captured by soldiers he is enlisted to re-steal the priceless "Heart of Fire Ruby" a ruby stolen by the notorious, wicked and impossible-to-hear villain, known as The Whisperer. Puss must partner with the villain's henchmen, The Three Little Kittens, to seize the ruby. Babysitting has never been more dangerous. Will our hero Puss in Boots tame the Three Diablos in time to recover the ruby?

programme.title: Far Far Away Idol S1 - EP 1
programme.desc: Watch your favorite Shrek characters sing the night away in this hilarious spoof. Join in the fun as Fiona, Puss in Boots, Donkey and the rest of the Far Far Away Kingdom battle it out in a singer's showdown.

programme.title: Scared Shrekless S1 - EP 1
programme.desc: Shrek gets in the Halloween spirit by challenging his fairytale friends to come up with scary stories for a contest. But the gang learn that they'll have to spend the night in Lord Farquaad's haunted castle before the winner is named.

programme.title: Madly Madagascar S1 - EP 1
programme.desc: Romance is in the air for Alex, Marty, Gloria and Melman after King Julien discovers a magical perfume and takes on the role as "King of Love."

programme.title: The Pig Who Cried Werewolf S1 - EP 1
programme.desc: The Three Pigs live in a house together, but Heimlich gets scared when he sees Wolf move in next door and acting strange.

programme.title: The Ghost of Lord Farquaad S1 - EP 1
programme.desc: Shrek, Fiona, and Donkey are on their way to the hotel where Shrek and Fiona will spend their honeymoon when they encounter Lord Farquaad's ghost!

programme.title: Megamind: The Button of Doom S1 - EP 1
programme.desc: After one "button" unleashes the gigantic robot MEGA-MEGAmind on Metro City, MegaMind and Minion must rely on their old tricks to restore order.

programme.desc: Susan Murphy (a.k.a. Ginormica) and the Monsters are now working with the US government as special ops. So when an alien presence is detected in Susan's hometown of Modesto, California -- right before Halloween -- the team is dispatched to investigate. Everything appears normal, right down to the jack-o-lanterns peering out from every doorstep and windowsill. But when Halloween arrives, those innocent-looking carved pumpkins reveal themselves for what they really are mutant aliens.

She digs and she digs and she digs.... until she finds total quiet. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales S1 - EP 50

Then one day there is very little food in Tinga Tinga and Lion summons all the animals to pull together and help find food for everyone. Squirrel is too busy braiding her tail to join in, but when she finally realises that there is not enough food to go round she races around gathering nuts for all the animals. The thing is she can't stop! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Australia Remastered: Drought S1 - EP 2

programme.desc: Jane Barnes might be married to one of Australia's biggest rockstars, but her creative journey is a story in its own right. She speaks to Barrie Cassidy about family, addiction, and becoming a social media star.

programme.title: 7.30 (2024) - EP 196

programme.desc: Nom Nom recruits the Bears to act as his entourage of friends. But when the Bears realise Nom Nom doesn't understand friendship, they decide to kick their day of bonding into high gear.

programme.title: We Bare Bears S2 - EP 5
programme.desc: After Panda gets injured on the basketball court, the Bears invite Charlie to be on their basketball team. But when Charlie gets too good, he starts to ruin all the fun of the game.

programme.title: We Bare Bears S2 - EP 6
programme.desc: The Bears switch bedrooms for the night and get a glimpse of the living space of one of their brothers. But as they go deeper, hidden secrets are revealed.

programme.title: We Bare Bears S2 - EP 7
programme.desc: To recover a missing package, the Bears get help from Ranger Tabes, an eccentric forest ranger. But her overblown sense of justice might be too much for the Bears to handle.

programme.title: We Bare Bears S2 - EP 8
programme.desc: Feeling unappreciated, Ice Bear leaves his brothers to be the chef of a restaurant. Desperate to fill the void, Grizz and Panda look for Ice Bear's replacement.

programme.title: We Bare Bears S2 - EP 9
programme.desc: Fed up with sharing, Panda forbids his brothers from using his cellphone any longer. But when the brothers get their own super-advanced smartphones, Panda starts to succumb to crippling jealousy.

programme.title: We Bare Bears S2 - EP 10
programme.desc: To abide by the clothing policy of their favourite Boba shop, the Bears get some new outfits. But with new looks come new lives - including office work, fashion modeling, and even falling in love!

programme.title: We Bare Bears S2 - EP 11
programme.desc: While trying to sail to Japan, the Baby Bears get stranded on an island. Luckily, they meet Dave and Karla, who help with survival on the island, while looking for an escape.

programme.title: We Bare Bears S2 - EP 12
programme.desc: The Bears become terribly ill and Chloe takes it upon herself to take care of them. But things get tricky when word of the Bears' sickness goes viral.

programme.title: We Bare Bears S2 - EP 13
programme.desc: The Baby Bears have an adventure in the sky, on a plane to Sweden. But when the Baby Bears are forced to sit in different sections of the plane, things go haywire for everyone on board.

programme.title: We Bare Bears S2 - EP 14
programme.desc: The Bears are reunited with their pet crab, Captain Craboo. But after an unfortunate run-in with Nom Nom, the Bears may lose their pet forever.

programme.title: We Bare Bears S2 - EP 15
programme.desc: Panda needs to meet his brothers at the most exclusive restaurant in town. But when he loses his contact lenses and can't see, Panda needs Charlie's help to get him into the city.

programme.title: We Bare Bears S2 - EP 16
programme.desc: Ice Bear rides his custom vacuum into the city. But when a gang of techies steals the vacuum, Ice Bear goes on a rescue mission that takes him through the underground world of the city.

programme.title: We Bare Bears S2 - EP 17
programme.desc: The Bears audition to be the next mascot for their favourite cereal. They get so caught up in the process that their competitiveness gets the better of them.

programme.title: We Bare Bears S2 - EP 18
programme.desc: Ranger Tabes tells the Bears she's been investigating a mysterious creature. But when the Bears realise she's actually investigating their friend, Charlie, they split up to ensure Charlie's safety.

programme.title: We Bare Bears S2 - EP 19
programme.desc: Through a standard video-browsing session online, we get a glimpse of the different kinds of videos the Bears have posted.

programme.title: We Bare Bears S2 - EP 20
programme.desc: The Bears find Chloe in the library, exhausted from studying for an exam all day. The Bears stay to help Chloe study, but make things worse in the process.

programme.title: We Bare Bears S2 - EP 21
programme.desc: When his brothers don't need his help for the day, Grizz leaves the cave to assist anyone he can throughout the city.

programme.title: We Bare Bears S2 - EP 22
programme.desc: Panda uses an app to find a friend with whom he has more in common. Soon things take a turn for the worse when the new friend gets too possessive.

programme.title: We Bare Bears S2 - EP 23
programme.desc: Baby Ice Bear lives alone in the Arctic and meets a mysterious man named Yuri. Together they help each other survive the cold environment.

programme.title: We Bare Bears S2 - EP 24
programme.desc: The Bears have been invited to all their friends' Christmas parties. To leave time to crash Nom Nom's huge star-studded bash, the Bears make quick stops at their friends' parties throughout the night.

programme.title: Us Money Movers
programme.desc: "Money Movers" provides investors with real-time analysis of the stories and the people attracting the attention of the markets each day. Capturing the energy of day’s early trading, the program includes the breaking news and numbers driving stocks and sectors, helping investors make critical decisions. "Money Movers" anchors speak with the CEOs, government decision-makers and newsmakers who play a relevant role in how money is moving.

programme.title: Us Halftime Report
programme.desc: Halftime Report is on the front lines of CNBC's market coverage. Host CNBC’s Scott Wapner and the Street's top investors get to the heart of the action as it's happening and help set the agenda for the rest of the day.

programme.title: Us Halftime Report
programme.desc: Halftime Report is on the front lines of CNBC's market coverage. Host CNBC’s Scott Wapner and the Street's top investors get to the heart of the action as it's happening and help set the agenda for the rest of the day.

programme.title: Us The Exchange
programme.desc: CNBC’s "The Exchange" is the newsroom-based program for today’s Investor. The show focuses on in-depth reporting around the most important and interesting stories to today’s markets and investors. CNBC’s deep roster of skilled reporters, guided by anchor Kelly Evans, provide actionable information to viewers as they make daily investment decisions.

programme.title: Us The Exchange

programme.title: Us Power Lunch
programme.desc: CNBC's Tyler Mathisen and Kelly Evans take you through the heart of the business day bringing you the latest developments and instant analysis on the stocks and stories driving the day’s agenda. Airing CNBC’s award-winning business news coverage, "Power Lunch" delves into the economy, markets, politics, technology and more.

Airing CNBC’s award-winning business news coverage, "Power Lunch" delves into the economy, markets, politics, technology and more.

programme.title: Us Closing Bell
programme.desc: Anything can happen between the bells of the trading day. But what happens during the last hour could be what matters most. Hosted by CNBC’s Scott Wapner, "Closing Bell" guides you through the most important hour of the trading day. The show takes a close-up look at how the markets are moving, what’s driving them and how investors are reacting.

programme.title: Us Closing Bell

programme.title: Us Closing Bell: Overtime
programme.desc: When the bell rings, the action does not end. "Closing Bell: Overtime" takes you through all of the after-hours moves including breaking news, corporate earnings and post-market trading. Big investors, smart strategists and top money managers debate actionable ideas and the big market themes of the day, and get viewers ready for tomorrow’s trading day.

programme.title: Asia Squawk Box
programme.desc: Anchored by Martin Soong and Sri Jegarajah at the Singapore Exchange (SGX), "Squawk Box" is CNBC’s flagship show that sets the news agenda and takes viewers through the pre-game and opening of Asia's business trading day, covering the top market moving stories and views from the top CEOs, asset managers and newsmakers.

programme.title: Asia Street Signs

programme.title: Capital Connection
programme.desc: Hosted by Dan Murphy at NASDAQ Dubai, "Capital Connection" gives you a reading on Asia's markets mid-day and sets you up for the Middle East and European trading day.

programme.title: Europe Squawk Box
programme.desc: Anchored by Steve Sedgwick, Karen Tso and Arabile Gumede, CNBC’s flagship show leads you into and delivers the open of the European markets. Featuring leading business executives, financial strategists and fund managers, "Squawk Box" provides original points of view and instant analysis of the latest business and market news.

programme.title: Europe Street Signs
programme.desc: One hour into Europe’s equity session, "Street Signs" provides the street's view and a link to business stories trending online and on social. Bridging the European and U.S. trading days across asset classes, it breaks key economic data in Europe and provides live price action in the biggest moving stocks, bonds, currencies and commodities.

programme.title: Us Worldwide Exchange
programme.desc: Broadcast from CNBC Global Headquarters in Englewood Cliffs, N.J., CNBC’s "Worldwide Exchange" delivers essential, actionable information and analysis for anyone who wants to be part of the global business conversation. Anchored by Frank Holland, the program prepares CNBC’s worldwide audience with a smart take on overnight U.S. news and live international market action.

programme.title: Us Squawk Box

programme.title: Us Squawk On The Street
programme.desc: Headquartered live on the floor of the New York Stock Exchange (NYSE) where the biggest companies in the world trade, "Squawk On The Street" tracks the action of every stock and gives you access to the treasury, currency and commodity action in real time. programme.title: The Cnbc Conversation
programme.desc: A show that lets the person talk for themselves and gives audiences a glimpse at the personality behind the public persona. Heads of State, titans of business and celebrated stars sit down for the CNBC Conversation.

programme.title: Cities Of Success - EP 3
programme.desc: The pandemic and the success of startup culture have sparked the emergence of new hubs for businesses outside of traditional power centers of New York, Chicago, Houston and San Francisco. These Cities of Success each have used unique characteristics - pop culture influence, clusters of great universities, friendly geography or forward-thinking local governments - to attract major companies and nurture an entrepreneurial community around them.

programme.title: Us Closing Bell: Overtime Rpt 2024 - EP 51
programme.desc: When the bell rings, the action does not end. programme.title: Channel Japan 2024
programme.desc: Channel Japan offers a fresh look at the latest in the economy, business, technology, culture and sightseeing of Japan.

programme.title: American Greed S1-15
programme.desc: "American Greed" goes inside the dark side of the American Dream - where money seduces, power corrupts, and smooth criminals will stop at nothing to get rich. Their complex scams leave victim's lives in shambles. Each episode is a deep dive into the minds and actions of heartless crooks who live lives most people can only dream of.

programme.title: A Beautiful Mind - EP 13
programme.desc: Hyunsung Hospital is the best national hospital with the most advanced medical techniques. Although it is obvious that it is the safest place to be in the country, something mysterious is happening inside the hospital. What is the truth? Who is the criminal? Lee Yeongo is an elite neurosurgeon. He may win recognition from the patients but when he is alone, he feels empty deep in the mind. There is no compassion or emotion for him. Could we think of him as good?

programme.desc: This programme explores seven countries along the Belt and Road, while also interviewing Chinese builders who have contributed in various projects, building railways, bridges and ports, and also providing technology to local people and bringing warmth to the poor.

programme.title: J Music
programme.desc: In each episode, popular singers are invited as guests, and they select their favourite works, performing with the live band to share their music with fans.

programme.title: Family Feud
programme.desc: This quiz game show is centred on the theme of societal issues and trending topics.

programme.title: ChatSAT
programme.desc: Teenagers are keen on trends. Stepping into the era of technology, they are particularly interested in emerging electronic products and popular media. Our hosts collect the newest information from all over the world, sharing their discoveries with viewers each week.

programme.title: Gourmet Express
programme.desc: Hong Kong is home to gourmet food from all over the world. Our food anchors and hosts keep up with the latest foodie information and offers, gaining an in-depth understanding of the stories behind the taste.

programme.title: News At 18:30
programme.desc: Bringing you the news from Hong Kong, the mainland and around the world every evening at 6:30pm.

programme.title: News Magazine 2024
programme.desc: A weekly special report on different Hong Kong and international headlines.

programme.title: Scoop 2024
programme.desc: This programme goes hot on the heels of the biggest happenings in society and the entertainment scene, bringing you the latest scoops.

programme.title: Infinity and Beyond 2024
programme.desc: TVB Jade brings you endless entertainment with concurrent dramas and sitcoms, as well as the latest news, variety and infotainment programmes from TVB.

programme.title: Med with Doc
programme.desc: Each episode of this show discusses different physical and psychological illnesses from the perspectives of traditional Chinese medicine and Western medicine. The latest treatment plans in the industry are also presented for viewers' reference.

programme.title: The Drunken Scotland
programme.desc: Hosts Kyle and Gillian visit Scotland, one of the birthplaces of whiskey, to explore three wine regions, taste fine wines and local delicacies, visit popular spots for couples, as well as experience the local culture in the famous Scottish Highlands.

programme.title: JSG Billboard 2024
programme.desc: Count down to the top 20 songs on JSG Billboard every episode!

programme.title: News Roundup
programme.desc: A round-up of the news before the day ends.

programme.title: Shock Mystery
programme.desc: This show documents strange happenings from all over the world, all of which cannot be explained from a point of view accepted by ordinary people. Explore incredible mysteries that not only existed in the past, but still exist today!

programme.title: Strange Tales of Tang Dynasty II - To The West - EP 37
programme.desc: Set during Tang Dynasty's peak, the sequel follows Lu Lingfeng (Yang Xuwen), head of the Dali Temple, and Su Wuming (Yang Zhigang), a Qianling official as they leave Chang'an for the west on a fearless journey to unravel mysterious cases amid lurking dangers.

programme.title: Forensic JD - EP 1

programme.title: Good Partner - EP 3
programme.desc: The story follows popular divorce lawyer Cha Eun-Kyung (Jang Na-ra), who finds herself faced with her own marital crisis. She often clashes with rookie lawyer Han Yoo-Ri (Nam Ji-Hyun) over cases. A workplace battle between the two lawyers is about to unfold.

programme.title: The Escape of the Seven: Resurrection - EP 15
programme.desc: Do Hyuk returns from the dead seeking revenge after being framed as a murderer. The seven wicked associates regroup for a renewed game of vengeance. Some seek revenge, others power, and some conceal their true motives in a new game of deceit and betrayal. How will the fates of the Seven reborn from lies end?

programme.title: As Beautiful As You - EP 36
programme.desc: Ji Xing (Tan Song Yun), refuses to endure the stifling corporate grind, she quits her job to embark on a challenging entrepreneurial journey and eventually secures the investment of Han Ting (Xu Kai). Together, they advance in the medical and health industry.

programme.title: Word Twisters' Adventures - EP 9
programme.desc: The most difficult thing for an articulate legal expert is not to win a lawsuit but to bargain for a twist of fate. Plagued by a mysterious family curse, CHAN MUNG-KAT (Chan Siu Chun), who comes from a legal family, is forced to fool around and devotes all his time to running a brothel despite his great talent.

programme.title: As Sure as Fate - EP 9
programme.desc: Due to business failure, De (Yuan Siu-hsiang) and his wife Mei (Kwok Siu-yun) returned to Hong Kong from Canada to seek further development due to business failure. rapport. However, De's father (Guo Feng) felt that the space at home was cramped, so he decided to sell his old residence and loaned the deposit received at high interest to his daughter Fei (Teng Liming)'s boyfriend Jian (Xie Tianhua).

programme.title: Ringmaster, The - EP 6
programme.desc: Muay Thai champion Hoi Ching-hei (Shuan Tam) manages to hold his ground in his farewell match. However, after a celebration gathering, he soon abruptly meets his death as he quarrels with someone while saving some drunk woman. Hoi Ching-nam (Owen Cheung) reviews his elder brother Ching-hei’s boxing match video. He finds out the cause of death surprisingly has something to do with coach Shek Ngo-shan (Wayne Lai). He is certain Ngo-shan has killed Ching-hei.

programme.title: Last Breakthrough, The - EP 25
programme.desc: Dr. WONG PO FUN (CHEUNG KA FAI, NICK) joins "Life Force", an international medical humanitarian organization, to carry out the unfulfilled wish of his deceased girlfriend, TUNG (LEUNG WING KEI, GIGI). He also sets up "Lung Shing Medical Centre" to help the poor. _x000D__x000D_ When FUN is working with the organization in Kenya, he meets a young doctor called CHAI PAK HANG (LAM, RAYMOND), who works at a private hospital named "Ling Siu" in Hong Kong.

programme.title: Vigilante Force - EP 21
programme.desc: Serious Crime sergeant, AH (LAM, BOWIE), grew up in a village in the New Territories. He is well respected by his colleagues. He works hard hoping to earn a promotion. One day, the headquarters appoints a superior, YIN (MA TAK CHUNG, JOE), to his division, killing all his hope. AH gets along with his colleagues. YIN is straight with his subordinates. Who will gain more co-operation from their colleagues? _x000D__x000D_ AH devotes himself to work.

programme.title: Vigilante Force - EP 24
programme.desc: Serious Crime sergeant, AH (LAM, BOWIE), grew up in a village in the New Territories. He is well respected by his colleagues. He works hard hoping to earn a promotion. One day, the headquarters appoints a superior, YIN (MA TAK CHUNG, JOE), to his division, killing all his hope. AH gets along with his colleagues. YIN is straight with his subordinates. Who will gain more co-operation from their colleagues? _x000D__x000D_ AH devotes himself to work.

programme.title: Word Twisters' Adventures - EP 10
programme.desc: The most difficult thing for an articulate legal expert is not to win a lawsuit but to bargain for a twist of fate. Plagued by a mysterious family curse, CHAN MUNG-KAT (Chan Siu Chun), who comes from a legal family, is forced to fool around and devotes all his time to running a brothel despite his great talent.

programme.title: As Sure as Fate - EP 10
programme.desc: Due to business failure, De (Yuan Siu-hsiang) and his wife Mei (Kwok Siu-yun) returned to Hong Kong from Canada to seek further development due to business failure. rapport. However, De's father (Guo Feng) felt that the space at home was cramped, so he decided to sell his old residence and loaned the deposit received at high interest to his daughter Fei (Teng Liming)'s boyfriend Jian (Xie Tianhua).

programme.title: Ringmaster, The - EP 6
programme.desc: Muay Thai champion Hoi Ching-hei (Shuan Tam) manages to hold his ground in his farewell match. However, after a celebration gathering, he soon abruptly meets his death as he quarrels with someone while saving some drunk woman. Hoi Ching-nam (Owen Cheung) reviews his elder brother Ching-hei’s boxing match video. He finds out the cause of death surprisingly has something to do with coach Shek Ngo-shan (Wayne Lai). He is certain Ngo-shan has killed Ching-hei.

programme.title: Last Breakthrough, The - EP 26
programme.desc: Dr. WONG PO FUN (CHEUNG KA FAI, NICK) joins "Life Force", an international medical humanitarian organization, to carry out the unfulfilled wish of his deceased girlfriend, TUNG (LEUNG WING KEI, GIGI). He also sets up "Lung Shing Medical Centre" to help the poor. _x000D__x000D_ When FUN is working with the organization in Kenya, he meets a young doctor called CHAI PAK HANG (LAM, RAYMOND), who works at a private hospital named "Ling Siu" in Hong Kong.

programme.title: Vigilante Force - EP 23
programme.desc: Serious Crime sergeant, AH (LAM, BOWIE), grew up in a village in the New Territories. He is well respected by his colleagues. He works hard hoping to earn a promotion. One day, the headquarters appoints a superior, YIN (MA TAK CHUNG, JOE), to his division, killing all his hope. AH gets along with his colleagues. YIN is straight with his subordinates. programme.title: Vista of China (Sr.17) - EP 73
programme.desc: Through the program, explore the different development and new features of the Chinese nation from different perspectives, and understand Chinese culture in ancient and modern China and abroad.

programme.title: Sky is the Limit, The - EP 16
programme.desc: CHOW KWOK CHING (Lam Bowie) was a disorderly guy with no ambitions. Though he was in his thirties, he did not have a career and changed jobs constantly. Under his mother’s pressure, CHING determined to join the police force. He did not do his work very well and finally was assigned to Sha Tau Kok where the border is. Meanwhile, CHING had misunderstanding with a mainland girl KAM LAN (Cheung Ho Yee, Maggie). He even perceived LAN as a bad woman and considered her as a sign of misfortune to him.

programme.title: Life Made Simple - EP 19
programme.desc: TING SHEUNG WONG (KWOK CHUN ON) is a 30 years old man with the IQ of a seven years old boy. Ironically, he is surely happier than anyone else._x000D__x000D_ WONG’s simple life ends when his best friend from childhood, WONG KEI FUNG CATHERINE (HSUAN JESSICA HESTER), goes to the U.S. to study. In order to realise FUNG’s dream of studying abroad, WONG gives her all his savings. She works at the Chung’s International Company Limited after her study.

programme.title: Life Made Simple - EP 20
programme.desc: TING SHEUNG WONG (KWOK CHUN ON) is a 30 years old man with the IQ of a seven years old boy. Ironically, he is surely happier than anyone else._x000D__x000D_ WONG’s simple life ends when his best friend from childhood, WONG KEI FUNG CATHERINE (HSUAN JESSICA HESTER), goes to the U.S. to study. In order to realise FUNG’s dream of studying abroad, WONG gives her all his savings. She works at the Chung’s International Company Limited after her study.

programme.title: My Ages Apart - EP 27
programme.desc: Mentor and mentee, SUNG CHUNG-KEI (Bobby Au Yeung) and KWONG KONG-SANG (Moses Chan), are highly-regarded bankers. To move up the corporate ladder, KONG-SANG deliberately transfers CHUNG-KEI out, but the plane CHUNG-KEI takes crashes. After regaining his consciousness, CHUNG-KEI finds himself trapped in the body of a millennial named BAO PAU (James Ng).

programme.title: My Ages Apart - EP 28
programme.desc: Mentor and mentee, SUNG CHUNG-KEI (Bobby Au Yeung) and KWONG KONG-SANG (Moses Chan), are highly-regarded bankers. To move up the corporate ladder, KONG-SANG deliberately transfers CHUNG-KEI out, but the plane CHUNG-KEI takes crashes. After regaining his consciousness, CHUNG-KEI finds himself trapped in the body of a millennial named BAO PAU (James Ng).

programme.title: How to Choose a Royal Bride
programme.desc: The Empress Dowager has arranged young and eligible women for Emperor Kangxi's selection. Kangxi is uninterested and becomes bored with the process. He decides to travel incognito as a businessman around the country when he meets Nalan Qiong Yao, who disguises herself as a man to avoid a possible arranged marriage with the Emperor...

programme.title: The Story Of My Son
programme.desc: Li attempts to make a fortune at the horse-racing tracks, but is subsequently entangled with loan sharks. Li becomes debt-laden while his sons are harassed by debt collectors, when more heart-wrenching events begin to unfold.

programme.title: My School Mate, The Barbarian
programme.desc: Edward attends a new school which has a reputation for fighting. Student leader Stone, befriends Edward, but their friendship is tested when a local triad leader discovers that Edward comes from a wealthy family.

programme.title: Winner Takes All
programme.desc: Two private detectives want to gain fame by solving a series of robberies. However, they were fooled by the King of Thieves during the investigation. It was later discovered that all the robberies were related to a Japanese businessman, Miyamoto. Who is the real King of Thieves?

programme.title: Out of the Dark
programme.desc: An old lady died after mysteriously falling off a building and her ghost appears to haunt the place. This freaked out the security guards, who invite ghostbuster Leo and his female assistant to help. In the process, Leo finds out that the old lady was killed by her son and daughter in law. To rest her soul, Leo promises to bring the couple to justice.

programme.title: Let's Make Laugh II
programme.desc: Bodyguard Ah Sun is sent to protect his boss' son, only to meet and fall in love with his mistress, the gorgeous Joey. As love blossoms between the two, the powerful boss finds out and all hell breaks loose!

programme.title: Look Out, Officer!
programme.desc: Stephen Chow is a delight in this supernatural action comedy, where a murdered police officer returns from beyond the grave to persuade a rookie cop into avenging his death.

programme.title: Beauty And The 7 Beasts
programme.desc: Teddy, once a renowned movie star, is facing a career decline. To make a living, he accepts five disciples to shape them into stars. Teddy's career regains momentum after he reunites with his long-lost daughter, but he is also confronted by a rival at the same time. His daughter and disciples decide to help him overcome this difficult situation...

programme.title: Face to Face
programme.desc: Tamotsu dies in a skiing accident and his roommate Yoshio marries his wife as well as inherits his entire fortune. At Tamotsu's funeral, Yoshio sees a badly disfigured old man and that is only the beginning of an evil downfall for him...

programme.title: Crazy N' The City
programme.desc: An apathetic Hong Kong police officer, Chris, is weary of his 7-year patrol unit work life. Tension arises when an energetic and conscientious policewoman, Nam, becomes his partner. However, as time goes by, Nam's dedication and bravery in her line of duty begins to reignite Chris' passion for work and life.

programme.title: The Myth
programme.desc: An archaeologist Jack, and a scientist William, stumble upon ancient Qin Dynasty artifacts that lead them to the mausoleum and mysteriously connects Jack to his past life as a warrior in ancient China, starting their mythical journey.

programme.title: My Darling Genie
programme.desc: A genie who is trapped in a Chinese oil umbrella helps an honorable young man and his uncle to deal with a covetous loan shark.

programme.title: Let's Make Laugh
programme.desc: When a young housewife's debt-ridden, philandering husband leaves her with a mountain of tax debts, a security guard is hired by the tax authority to guard the assets, but he starts falling for her instead.

programme.title: Love For All Seasons
programme.desc: May, acting leader of the Er Mei sect, cures the incurable illness of Tiger, a rich playboy. Under the threat of her senior, May seeks help from Tiger to experience heartbreak and master the "Heartbroken Sword" style, so as to defeat her senior and preserve Er Mei sect. Will this strange and long-winding relationship reach a happy ending?

programme.title: Challenge of the Gamesters
programme.desc: A gambling master and his partner are hired by the government to investigate another gambler who may be working as a Japanese spy in Shanghai.

programme.title: Golden Chicken 2
programme.desc: The sequel is set in 2046 when a 82-year-old Ah Kam stops a heartbroken young man from taking memory loss pills. To help ease his pain, Ah Kam shares her life stories from 2003, one of Hong Kong's toughest year with SARS, including the different people she comes across and the bittersweet romance between herself and her cousin.

programme.title: Rob-B-Hood
programme.desc: The famous "Gang Trio" is hired to kidnap a baby for 30 million dollars. When they realize that the triad is after both the ransom and the baby's life, they decide to make the hostage their protege. Cornered by cops and threatened by gangsters, the three 'Rob-B-Hood' must put the baby safely back in his cradle.

programme.title: Heroic Duo
programme.desc: Police officer Ken needs help to solve a grisly crime that the offender has no recollection of committing. Ken seeks out Jack, a former psychologist who is now imprisoned. Forming an uneasy truce, this unconventional duo sets out to find the man responsible. It is at this time that Ken falls into a trap set up by Jack...

programme.title: Winner Takes All
programme.desc: Swindler Master Wong has cheated Pauline's father of his lifetime savings and Pauline vows to bring him to justice. On the way to find Wong, Pauline befriends a young conman and teams up with him to set up a perfect plot to scam Wong. Will their plan succeed and can she uphold justice in the end?

programme.title: Destiny's Champion
programme.desc: An aging fighter relives the mistakes of his violent past through a poor and streetwise kid, who severely injures his nemesis during a battle to win a girl's heart.

programme.title: The Eagle Shooting Heroes
programme.desc: Executive produced by Wong Kar Wai, "The Eagle Shooting Heroes" is loosely based on Louis Cha's classics. Whilst mistaken identity and rampant gender confusion are on the menu, Sammo Hung's action direction and the incredible all-star casts also keep the laughs and thrills coming in this Hong Kong-style crazy comedy.

programme.title: Law Or Justice
programme.desc: Lawyer Yip defends a rapist and gets him acquitted. Yip's boyfriend Fong, a police inspector, knows he is guilty and despises Yip for not upholding justice. The victim's sister takes revenge by spiking the rapist's drink but is raped instead. This puts the rapist back in court. Will Yip choose to uphold law or justice this time?

programme.title: Undercover Hidden Dragon
programme.desc: In this hilarious comedy, Fat is a gangster who suffers from amnesia. Believing that he is actually an undercover policeman, Fat attempts to arrest gang leader Big Bro, but instead becomes the gangsters' best ally. To complicate matters further, a gangster named Wind, who looks exactly like Fat, starts a turf war with Big Bro.

programme.title: Mr. Virgin
programme.desc: Mr. Virgin is a romantic comedy about a twenty-nine year-old man Chao Yu-ting (Alfred Chang) who has seemingly been cursed. He becomes paranoid when a Feng Shui expert tells him it will be unlucky for him to marry before the age of thirty... so comical chaos line the days up to his next birthday!

programme.title: The Phantom Lover
programme.desc: In 1926 China, Sung, a talented singer, is deeply in love with To, a sweet innocent girl from a wealthy family. Their love evokes strong disapproval from To's father and bitter jealousy from her designated fiance, a young man chosen by her family. This is a story about a singer and a wealthy girl battling to be together in a traditional community.

programme.title: Midnight Fly
programme.desc: With her marriage in crisis, Michele takes off to Europe for a vacation and meets a Japanese woman named Miki. As they become friends and travel together, Michele discovers that Miki is her husband's mistress. When Miki goes missing in Morocco, Michele does everything she can to find her but ends up paying a heavy price...

programme.title: Love and Let Love!
programme.desc: Cliff proposes to his girlfriend Terry but is killed in a car accident before she says "yes". Terry is devastated and inconsolable. When Cliff's ghost returns, they seem to go back to their good old days. However, Cliff is determined to help Terry get over his death and start anew.

programme.title: Dummy Mommy, without a Baby
programme.desc: Fong Lai Kuen works at an advertising agency but is about to be sacked by her boss after offending him. She pretends to be pregnant so that the company cannot fire her, according to the labour law. Since then, Fong receives much care and love from her colleagues and begins to feel guilty about her lie as things develop out of her expectations.

programme.title: Initial D
programme.desc: The movie is adapted from a famous Japanese manga. 18-year-old Takumi delivers tofu in his father's near-obsolete car every day and becomes a good racer with perfect drifting skill. Encouraged by his father, he joins a mountain race and unexpectedly wins it, making him famous overnight and leading him from one exciting race to another.

programme.title: Wo Hu
programme.desc: The Hong Kong Police has placed more than a thousand undercover officers in various triad groups to bring down the largest criminal organization in Hong Kong. Betrayal, deceit and murder bring this group of "brothers" into a collision with the law and with each other!

programme.title: The 82 Tenants
programme.desc: Continuing the success of the classic comedy "House of 72 tenants", this sequel tells the stories of tenants living in an old building in Hong Kong who are forced to evict by the developers. Some tenants prefer to take the compensation while some resist the move. Will the acquisitions plan destroy the harmony of the neighborhood?

programme.title: The Golden Sword
programme.desc: Swordswoman supreme Cheng Pei-pei (Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon) teams up with director/writer/actor Lo Wei (director of Bruce Lee and Jackie Chan's first major movies) for an evocative and terrific "Martial arts world" adventure consisting of a missing blade and a deadly sect of men-hating swordswomen.

programme.title: The Mad Monk Strikes Again
programme.desc: The Mad Monk is up against the equally legendary scholar-turned-genie, Lu Tung Pin. The duo create havoc as they vie with each other, be it in mirth, magic, women or weapons!

programme.title: The Swordmates
programme.desc: Li asks his swordmate Wang to protect his family while he is away, but Wang rapes his wife and even has his convoy attacked. Li escaped but fears his daughter is still in danger, so he asks the nephew of his master to help protect her...

programme.title: The Brave Archer 2
programme.desc: Knowing Guo Jing has won Huang Rong's hand in marriage using the kung fu learned from Jiu Yin manual, Ouyang Feng captures Huang and agrees to release her only if Guo can dictate the content of the manual. Will Guo give in to the threat?

programme.title: Bat Without Wings
programme.desc: The Bat Without Wings, a notorious rapist-murderer, has returned after a five-year absence. A young swordsman and a convoy master investigate the case and suspect that the Bat may be framed. A saying goes that a treasure map is hidden under the Bat's knife, so they try to use that to hunt the real culprit...

programme.title: Duel Of Fist
programme.desc: Fan Ke discovers at his father's deathbed that he has a half-brother, Wenlie, in Thailand. He goes to find Wenlie, who became a boxer to support his sick mother. Following their encounter, the two got involved in the underworld of boxing match gambling.

programme.title: The 5 Billion Dollar Legacy
programme.desc: A crippled billionaire mails a letter to each of his long-lost daughters inviting them to go to Japan, in the hope that he will find a worthy heir to inherit his vast fortune. The sisters finally meet abroad the plane to Japan, and one of them is taken with a man who is going to investigate the death of his lawyer uncle in a mysterious hit-and-run.

programme.title: Love without End
programme.desc: In this classic romantic melodrama, nightclub songstress Qing Qing falls for the handsome Peng Nan. However, the two go through an emotional roller coaster of misunderstandings, separations and mutual torment. When the two finally fall back into love, Qing Qing receives a shocking revelation that brings the story to its inevitable sad ending.

programme.title: Crocodile River
programme.desc: This story has a Romeo and Juliet flavour. Two families who hate each other live across the opposite sides of a river filled with crocodiles and do not bother to have a bridge built. Their respective children meet in university and fall in love, but have to find ways to be together and resolve the hatred between their families.

programme.title: The Villains
programme.desc: Hung is an orphan seeking help from her wealthy uncle who has two sons but only dotes on the younger son Feng, a playboy. Feng covets the beauty of Hung and rapes her but when she gets pregnant, Hung is wrongfully accused and gets sent off by her uncle to protect Feng. Will Feng be punished for his villainy?

programme.title: River of Tears
programme.desc: Retired singer Fang lives happily with her husband and son. Tragedy happens when a man from her past returns to haunt her. In an ensuing struggle to free her from his clutches, her husband dies in a car accident. Blamed by her father-in-law for her husband's death, Fang gets chased out of the house and goes back to singing to make a living...

programme.title: Life Gamble
programme.desc: Martial arts master Yu has retired for years but is invited to join force with another master Tao to fight against the four famous thieves and retrieve the stolen Dragon Jade. However, Tao's real plan is to possess the treasure himself and kills Yu after he defeats the thieves...

programme.title: Na Cha the Great
programme.desc: Adapted from a chapter of the classic Chinese legend "Investiture of the Gods", this is the story of Na Cha set 3000 years ago. After Na Cha sacrificed his life to save his parents, he is reincarnated with his spirit embodied in a lotus flower and is armed with two magic weapons to save the people from their despotic emperor.

programme.title: Flying Guillotine 2
programme.desc: In a time of anti-Manchu sentiment, Emperor Yong Zheng employs his ruthless Blood Hound Corps to silence any dissenters. Only one man and his signature weapon, The Flying Guillotine, stand in their way.

programme.title: Intimate Confessions of a Chinese Courtesan
programme.desc: Young Ai Nu is abducted and sold to the popular Four Seasons brothel run by the powerful and ruthless Madam Chun Yi. Ai Nu gets locked up in a dungeon due to her fiery attitude. Soon, a murder occurs within the brothel and a policeman must race against time to prevent a vicious revenge plot from reaching its blood-spattered conclusion.

programme.title: Brothers from the Walled City
programme.desc: Two orphaned brothers growing up in Kowloon's Walled City - the place where people are forced to live with indecent businesses of sex, gambling and drugs controlled by triads - take very different life paths. Chin works at a cabaret but keeps away from sins, while Kang is drawn to the sleazy underworld. Are their destinies shaped by the "walls"?

programme.title: The Mad Monk
programme.desc: The movie consists of four stories of the Mad Monk helping others, from saving a mother and daughter from crumbling walls, to helping hawkers deal with bullies, recovering stolen money for a young man and punishing a devious court official and his son.

programme.title: Dead End
programme.desc: Uninhibited youth Chun meets a rich girl Wen when her car breaks down and drives her home. Chun falls in love with Wen but Wen's brother dislikes him and forbids his sister to see him. He humiliates Chun and gets Chun beaten up, so Chun takes the pistol he has found accidentally on the street to Wen's home and shoots her brother dead.

programme.title: Let's Fall In Love
programme.desc: Da Yung, the son of a rich entrepreneur, meets Lian Lian, the niece of a kindergarten principal by chance. They fall into a misunderstanding on the first meeting, causing Da Yung to lose his wallet. Further misunderstanding occurs when he tries to get her to act as his fiance so as to drive away two women whom he does not like...

programme.title: The Blood Brothers
programme.desc: The friendship of three sworn brothers, Zhang, Huang and Ma ends when Ma gives in to corruption and falls for Huang's wife, eventually leading to a bloody ending.

programme.title: The Black Enforcer
programme.desc: Lung the Black Enforcer is ordered to escort a murderer Fei to prison. While taking shelter in Lung's house from the snowstorm, Fei is rescued by his gang and Fei kills Lung's mother and sister before escaping. Lung is imprisoned for the failed task and after being released, he vows to avenge his family by killing Fei.

programme.title: The Deadly Knives
programme.desc: Martial arts student Yen returns from school to defend his family homestead against Japanese financiers after his father is killed. On the way, he meets Hua and falls in love with her. However, Hua discovers that her father is plotting with the Japanese to take Yen's property and wants to murder him. It is a tough choice between family and love...

programme.title: Long Road to Gallantry
programme.desc: Tu Meng Fei makes his way to the world after completing his kung fu training. En route, he rescues Mu Wan Erh and Li San Nan from a band of thugs and later learnt of a 20-year conflict between the evil Thunder Gang Chief Leng Tian Lei and the Dragon Sect. Mu's lost father is none other than the Thunder Gang Chief, who also killed Li's father...

programme.title: The Dream of the Red Chamber
programme.desc: Adapted from the great Chinese classic novel of the same name, the son of renowned Jia family, Bao Yu, is deeply in love with his cousin, Dai Yu. However, his mother disapproves of their relationship and plots to arrange Bao Yu to marry another rich girl, resulting in a tragic ending for the perfect couple.

programme.title: Disco Bumpkins
programme.desc: This musical comedy is about how a young man Fen, along with his buddy Hamburger, finds love and success in the advertising world.

programme.title: A Maid From Heaven
programme.desc: The seventh daughter of the Jade Emperor is banished from heaven to live a mortal life as she is very mischievous. She falls in love with a young village lad Yong, who sold himself to work for the rich so as to bury his father. The goddess sisters help Yong to pay his debt so the lovebirds can be together. Is this going to end happily-ever-after?

programme.title: The Rescue
programme.desc: Threatened by the Yuan who are closing in to rule the whole of China, a band of Song survivors band together to save their prime minister. This bold and fearless heroes fighting for their cause are led by international star, Lo Lieh (Glass Tears, Killer Clans) and Shi Szu (Lovers Destiny), who must fight their way out of trap after trap. But they can't escape them all, and eventually the two end up in prison... it is either death or a fight to the end!

Some seek revenge, others power, and some conceal their true motives in a new game of deceit and betrayal. How will the fates of the Seven reborn from lies end?
